name: Kinvasoft Multi-level menu for Ecwid
author: Kinvasoft

sections.description:
Multi-level menu app for Ecwid. Give your customers simple, intuitive and attractive category navigation for better shopping experience.

In order to use the plugin please make sure you have:
1. Ecwid account
2. Ecwid plugin for WordPress
3. Multi-level menu app for Ecwid
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/kinvasoft-multi-level-menu directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Add menu to desired section on Menus configuration page or on Widgets configuration page (depends on the theme used).

See Ecwid In Action

  • Demo
sections.faq:
I have questions regarding the plugin and app work, how to get support?

Write your questions to support@kinvasoft.com or contact our support team in chat.

How secure is this plugin?

Multi-level menu app and WordPress plugin are validated and approved by Ecwid. More details
Privacy policy

Ecwid is PCI DSS Level 1 certified shopping cart plugin â€“ the gold standard for e-commerce solutions worldwide.
This helps your online store meet the security requirements of the bank you do business with. More details

How much does it all cost?

Multi-level menu has a 7 days free trial, so you’ll get a full paid version at no cost this time.
After the trial period is end it will cost $4.99/month.

Ecwid shopping cart plans vary by number of products, types of ecommerce functionality, and level of support.
* Free – Up to 10 products
* Venture – $15/month
* Business – $35/month
* Unlimited – $99/month

Pro Tip: you can save money by enrolling in annual Ecwid plans. For more information, check out here pricing page.
